channel.title: Need 508 client pleeeeeaaseee
channel.description:
OMG!! i looked everywhere!! why are'nt there any clients on 508? or am i stupid and dont need client??
i'm new to 508, but nobody asks for a client anywhere at 508 downloads, cant find any client..
anybody got a 508 client for me?? i had 1, the Umairscape fullscreen client, but it didnt worked, it always says:
[code]Error: SignLink:233 SignLink:372 Applet_Sub1:339 client:2196 | java.lang.Runtime Exception [/code]
Please anybody send me a good client, or help me to fix this one, thanks, maxie35.

item.title: Need 508 client pleeeeeaaseee
item.dc:creator: @Maxie35 Maxie35
item.description:
@Maxie35 wrote:

Read more specific please, I really looked all over the site.

But ill try and use google, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Need 508 client pleeeeeaaseee
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Use the search feature before asking, if you can’t find one then use Google.

Read full topic
